overview: Mature, sexy Terri (Rebecca Bardoux) is engaged to marry her successful fianc Frank. But Frank's pouty daughter April (Lara Brookes) can't stand the big busted older woman, and refuses to accept her into the family. Meanwhile, Terri's former stepdaughter Jennifer (Mia Gold) reads about Terri's impending nuptials in the newspaper and contacts April to tell her the truth: Her new stepmother is an insatiable lesbian who sexually preys on her new "stepdaughters."
title: Lesbian Stepmother
